001import javax.swing.JButton;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
004import javax.swing.JDialog;
005import javax.swing.JFrame;
006import java.awt.Cursor;
007import java.awt.Color;
008import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
009import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
010
011/**
012 * Décrivez votre classe CancelButton ici.
013 *
014 * @author (votre nom)
015 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
016 */
017public class ConfirmButton extends JButton implements MouseListener {
018    /**
019     * Interface graphique
020     */
021    private UserInterface aUI;
022    /**
023     * Fenetre de dialogue
024     */
025    private JDialog aDialog;
026    /**
027     * Joueur
028     */
029    private MC aMC;
030    
031    /**
032     * Couleur de fond
033     */
034    private Color aBGColor;
035    /**
036     * Couleur de texte
037     */
038    private Color aTextColor;
039    /**
040     * Couleur de fond lors du survolage
041     */
042    private Color aHoverBGColor;
043    /**
044     * Couleur de texte lors du survolage
045     */
046    private Color aHoverTextColor;
047    
048    /**
049     * Constructeur naturel de ConfirmButton
050     */
051    public ConfirmButton(final String pText, final JDialog pDialog, final UserInterface pUI) {
052        super(pText);
053        this.aUI = pUI;
054        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
055        
056        this.aBGColor = new Color(61, 51, 51);
057        this.aTextColor = new Color(250, 240, 240);
058        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(50, 40, 40);
059        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(160, 150, 150);
060        this.aDialog = pDialog;
061        this.setBorderPainted(false);
062        this.setFocusPainted(false);
063        Module.setFontSize(this, 14);
064        this.setCursor(new Cursor(Cursor.HAND_CURSOR));
065        this.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
066        this.setForeground(this.aTextColor);
067        
068        this.addMouseListener(this);
069    }
070    
071    @Override
072    public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
073    }
074    
075    @Override
076    public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
077    }
078    
079    @Override
080    public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) {
081        
082        this.setBackground(this.aHoverBGColor);
083        this.setForeground(this.aHoverTextColor);
084    }
085    
086    @Override
087    public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) {
088        this.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
089        this.setForeground(this.aTextColor);
090    }
091    
092    @Override
093    public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
094        if(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD.equals("look")) {
095            if(PopupButton.SECOND_WORD.equals("")) {
096                return;   
097            } else if(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD.equals("look") && PopupButton.SECOND_WORD.equals("salle")) {
098                this.aUI.getGE().interpretCommand(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD);
099            }  else {
100            this.aUI.getGE().interpretCommand(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD + " " + PopupButton.SECOND_WORD);
101            }
102        } else if(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD.equals("write")) {
103            System.out.println("debut");
104            Player vTarget = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(WriteButton.TARGET.split(" ")[0].toLowerCase());
105            System.out.println("fin");
106            String vContent = WriteButton.CONTENT.getText();
107            this.aMC.addItem(new Letter(this.aMC, vTarget, vContent));
108            this.aMC.removeItem(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("feuille"));
109            this.aMC.removeItem(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("encre"));
110            System.out.println("lettre ecrite");
111            WriteButton.TARGET = "";
112            WriteButton.CONTENT.setText("");
113        }
114        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = "";
115        PopupButton.SECOND_WORD = "";
116        this.aUI.getLookButton().setTarget("");
117        this.aDialog.dispose();
118    }
119}
